abstract: Duke Energy is on the lookout for certain distressed wind energy assets, executives said in a conference call Tuesday held to discuss its earnings for the first quarter of 2009.
lead_paragraph: Duke Energy is on the lookout for certain distressed wind energy assets, executives said in a conference call Tuesday held to discuss its earnings for the first quarter of 2009.

headline.main: Duke Energy Keeps Eye Peeled for Distressed Wind Assets
